name: Bounced (itch) (Kridotsuk)
description:
Protect yourself from the ruthless enemies who will stop at nothing to kill you. Rotate to aim and shoot to kill .Survive for as long as you can before the enemies climb up and get you. Enjoy :) 

                                                                   -  Kridotsuk

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

Left Arrow Key / A  : Rotate Left
Right Arrow Key / D : Rotate Right
Spacebar            : Shoot

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

Made by me using the Unity Game Engine

Music made by me using Bosca Ceoil

Sound Effects made by me using Bfxr

_____________________________________________________________________________________________
